data.message: Eminem loves his haters as much as his fans. He plays the ego of bad guy and devil to get a rise out of u illuminati fools. He likes the fact that u hate him, he writes all his songs about how he has so many haters.  He knows he does fucked up shit but he doesnt care. He laughs at the fact that so many kids idolize him, he knows he does asshole stuff. He does it on purpose. The world was in need of an asshole. Eminem gives us the gossip and controversy we all need. He airs shit out real well, he doesnt let the stench of shit fester. Go Eminem! Your a living legend, the critics may hate you now but the fans will mourn when u are gone. Keep doin what your doin.
